frontmatter.title: Demo of Chrome Extension & VS Code Extension

labPresets.initialPrompt: Demonstrate how the Chrome or VS Code extension can be used to upgrade and run prompts directly within workflows.

examples: Use the Chrome extension to upgrade a prompt on a news article.
Run a prompt upgrade inside VS Code for a Python function documentation task.

quiz.q: True or False: The PromptForge Chrome extension allows users to refine prompts directly in the browser.
Which of the following is a benefit of the VS Code extension?
choices: Upgrading prompts within the coding workflow
quiz.answer: Upgrading prompts within the coding workflow
